featured.text: Amy gave Laura a big hug and promised that she would come back to see her.

definition.zh_def: 擁抱，通常是用雙臂環繞某人以表達親密或關心。
definition.en_def: To hold someone closely in one's arms as a way of showing affection.
definition.example: She gave her friend a warm hug after not seeing her for years.
